name: name
description: The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

name: type
description: Type of input control to render. Defaults to `"text"`.

name: value
description: Optional initial value of the input.

name: describedBy
description: One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: prefix
description: Optional prefix text to be displayed before the input.

name: suffix
description: Optional suffix text to be displayed after the input.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the input component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the input.

name: autocomplete
description: autocomplete attribute to identify input purpose, for instance `"postal-code"` or `"username"`.

name: pattern
description: pattern attribute to provide a regular expression pattern, used to match allowed character combinations for the input value.

name: spellcheck
description: Optional field to enable or disable the spellcheck attribute on the input.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the input.
